fields.description: a. Signs and symptoms of Ebola
fields.title: a. Signs and symptoms of Ebola
fields.content:
Sudden onset of fever, intense weakness, muscle pain, headache and sore throat
are typical signs and symptoms. This is followed by vomiting, diarrhoea, rash,
impaired kidney and liver function, and in some cases, both internal and
external bleeding.

_Ebola virus disease infections can only be confirmed through laboratory
testing._
